input: "Job Description: Experienced Mobile Wallet DeveloperIntroduction:We are a cutting-edge technology company seeking a skilled and experienced Mobile Wallet Developer to join our dynamic team. If you have a passion for creating innovative mobile payment solutions and have a proven track record in developing successful mobile wallet applications, then this is the perfect opportunity for you. Join us as we revolutionize the way people make payments and simplify their financial transactions!Overview of the Role:As an experienced Mobile Wallet Developer, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining our mobile wallet application. You will work closely with our cross-functional team of designers, product managers, and engineers to ensure a seamless and secure user experience. Your expertise will be pivotal in transforming our vision into a reality, as we strive to deliver a world-class mobile wallet solution to our global user base.Responsibilities:- Collaborate with product managers and designers to translate requirements into technical specifications for the mobile wallet application.- Design, develop, and test mobile wallet features and functionalities, ensuring code quality and adherence to industry best practices.- Implement secure payment processing systems, integrating with various payment gateways and financial institutions.- Optimize performance and user experience through continuous improvements and updates.- Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues, providing timely support to ensure maximum uptime and minimal disruption for users.- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies, recommending innovative solutions to enhance the mobile wallet application.Skills and Qualifications:- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.- Proven experience as a Mobile Wallet Developer, with a strong portfolio of successful mobile wallet applications.- Proficient in programming languages such as Java, Kotlin, Swift, or React Native.- Extensive knowledge of mobile application development frameworks and tools (e.g., Android Studio, Xcode).- Familiarity with backend technologies, APIs, and database management systems.- Experience integrating with payment gateways and implementing secure payment processing systems.- Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively convey complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.Benefits:- Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.- Opportunity to work with a highly skilled and diverse team in a collaborative and inclusive environment.- Professional development and growth opportunities, with access to the latest technologies and industry trends.- Flexible work hours and the option for remote work.- Company-sponsored social events and team-building activities.- Make a significant impact in shaping the future of mobile payment solutions.Call to Action:If you are a talented Mobile Wallet Developer with a passion for innovation and a desire to revolutionize the fintech industry, we want to hear from you. Join our team and be part of an exciting journey as we redefine the way people manage their finances. Apply now and let's create the future together!Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00Posted On: February 22, 2024 23:56 UTCCategory: Mobile App DevelopmentSkills:Social Media Account Integration, Map Integration, Chat & Messaging Software, Payment Functionality, Objective-C, Smartphone, In-App PurchasesSkills: Social Media Account Integration, Map Integration, Chat & Messaging Software, Payment Functionality, Objective-C, Smartphone, In-App PurchasesCountry: Algeria"

input: "Sales Outreach Specialist (Commission-Based)Location: RemoteAbout Us:My Digital Marketing Agency is a leading provider of tailored digital marketing solutions, specializing in [mention specific services]. With a focus on driving tangible results and fostering long-term partnerships, we empower businesses to thrive in the digital landscape.Job Description:We are seeking a motivated and entrepreneurial Sales Outreach Specialist to join our team on a commission-based arrangement. In this role, you will be responsible for sourcing leads, initiating contact through outbound calls, and scheduling appointments with decision-makers to discuss our services. You will play a crucial role in driving new business opportunities and contributing to the growth of our agency.Responsibilities:Identify and research potential leads within our target market using various channels and tools.Conduct proactive outreach via phone calls to engage prospects and introduce our digital marketing solutions.Clearly communicate our value proposition and tailor pitches to address the specific needs of each prospect.Schedule appointments for consultations and demonstrations with decision-makers, ensuring alignment with their availability and preferences.Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to optimize outreach strategies and campaigns.Maintain accurate records of interactions, appointments booked, and sales progress.Continuously seek ways to improve lead generation and conversion processes.Requirements:Proven experience in sales outreach or telemarketing, with a track record of achieving or exceeding targets.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a persuasive and confident phone manner.Strong ability to research and identify potential leads, with a proactive and results-oriented approach.Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a remote work environment.Familiarity with CRM software and proficiency in Microsoft Office or Google Suite.Passion for digital marketing and eagerness to learn about our services and industry trends.Compensation:This position offers a competitive commission-based structure, where you will earn 20% of the sale for each successful deal closed. The more sales you generate, the higher your earning potential.Benefits:Flexible remote work environment with the freedom to manage your schedule.Opportunity to earn uncapped commission based on your performance and results.Potential for career growth and advancement within the company as we continue to expand.Supportive team environment with ongoing training and resources to help you succeed.How to Apply:If you are a self-motivated sales professional with a passion for driving results and creating opportunities, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are interested in joining our team. Include any notable achievements or examples of successful sales initiatives. We look forward to reviewing your application.Kind RegardsGregory Prouse (CEO)Budget: $250Posted On: February 19, 2024 04:03 UTCCategory: Sales & Business DevelopmentSkills:Lead Generation, Sales, Cold Calling, Outbound Sales, Telemarketing, SchedulingSkills: Lead Generation, Sales, Cold Calling, Outbound Sales, Telemarketing, SchedulingCountry: United Kingdom"

input: "We are a small digital marketing agency based in Newcastle NSW (Australia), looking for a contractor to take control of our Paid Ads.Ideally looking for someone Newcastle based (though would consider further afield for the right person) to take on new campaign builds and manage existing accounts.This role would be behind the scenes where you’d be liaising direct with our Account Managers - allowing them to work directly with clients while you focus on proactive strategy, optimisation, making smart recommendations and ensuring the ongoing performance of campaigns and results!We need someone who is tech savvy, able to build a comprehensive campaign from start to finish, including setting up of conversion tracking (GA4, Tag Manager, Datasets, etc.), provide budget forecasts and overall, be a great and proactive communicator.Campaign builds would typically range from a small build of 3hrs to a more comprehensive build of 8hrs - there could be a few of these each month. input: "## Indoor Growing & Microgreen Kits Dropshipping Business Setup**Project Overview:**We are excited to launch a dropshipping business on Amazon, (and ideally additional platforms) focusing on the niche of indoor growing and microgreen kits. We are seeking experienced and motivated freelancers to assist us in efficiently setting up and managing various aspects of this venture.**Project Scope:****Phase 1: Product Research & Selection:*** Conduct in-depth research to identify high-demand, profitable indoor growing and microgreen kits within specific sub-niches (e.g., beginner kits, specific microgreen varieties, etc.).* Analyze competition, pricing trends, and potential suppliers using relevant tools like Jungle Scout, Helium 10, and SellerApp.* Recommend at least 10-15 high-potential product options with detailed reports justifying their selection.**Phase 2: Amazon Seller Account Setup & Optimization:*** Assist with registering and verifying a professional Amazon seller account.* Optimize product listings with high-quality titles, descriptions, and relevant keywords for improved search visibility.* Design attractive and informative product images showcasing features and benefits.* Set competitive pricing strategies based on market research and profit margin goals.**Phase 3: Supplier Sourcing & Management:*** Identify and vet reliable dropshipping suppliers who meet Amazon's compliance requirements and offer high-quality products.* Negotiate competitive pricing and establish communication channels with chosen suppliers.* Develop clear guidelines for order fulfillment, inventory management, and communication protocols.**Phase 4: Ongoing Management & Optimization:*** Monitor product performance, track sales, and analyze customer feedback.* Recommend adjustments to product listings, pricing, and marketing strategies based on data and trends.* Provide ongoing support with customer service inquiries and order management issues.**Required Skills & Experience:*** Proven experience in e-commerce, preferably with Amazon dropshipping.* Strong understanding of product research, market analysis, and keyword optimization.* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.* Ability to work independently, manage multiple tasks, and meet deadlines.* Familiarity with tools like Jungle Scout, Helium 10, and SellerApp.**Additional Information:*** We are a small team dedicated to building a successful and sustainable business.* We are open to discussing long-term collaboration and ongoing support beyond the initial setup phase.* Please provide your hourly rate and estimated timeline for completing each phase.**Ready to help us grow our indoor growing and microgreen kit business on Amazon? We look forward to reviewing your proposals!**Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00Posted On: February 13, 2024 21:53 UTCCategory: Dropshipping & Order ProcessingSkills:Amazon FBA, Shopify, BigCommerce, Amazon, Content Writing, Graphic Design, Lead Generation, Social Media Marketing, Ecommerce, DropshippingSkills: Amazon FBA, Shopify, BigCommerce, Amazon, Content Writing, Graphic Design, Lead Generation, Social Media Marketing, Ecommerce, DropshippingCountry: Israel"

input: "About Our Firm:We are a distinguished law firm specializing in Estate Planning and Probate services. Our practice is dedicated to assisting families and individuals in planning for the future and navigating the complexities that arise after the loss of a loved one. Probate is the legal process through which a deceased person's estate is properly distributed to heirs and designated beneficiaries and any debt owed to creditors is paid off. Given the delicate nature of our work, our marketing efforts require a thoughtful and compassionate approach, acknowledging the sensitive circumstances our clients may be facing.Role Overview:We're seeking a part-time Digital Marketing Specialist with a deep understanding of Go High Level, Facebook Ads, Google Ads, and YouTube, to join our team. This specialist will play a crucial role in reaching and engaging with our target audience, mindful of the sensitive nature of Estate Planning and Probate. This position offers the flexibility to work remotely and on your own schedule, with the option to participate in our weekly team meetings.Key Responsibilities:• Craft and implement sensitive and respectful digital marketing campaigns that align with our Estate Planning and Probate practice areas.• Manage targeted advertising campaigns on Facebook and Google, ensuring that messaging is appropriate for an audience potentially dealing with loss or planning for the future.• Utilize YouTube to convey our firm's commitment to providing compassionate and professional legal assistance during difficult times.• Collaborate with our content and web management teams to ensure a unified and empathetic approach across all digital platforms.• Remain current on digital marketing trends, particularly those relevant to the legal industry, to ensure our efforts are both effective and appropriate.Ideal Candidate:• Has significant experience in digital marketing, with specific skills in Go High Level, Facebook Ads, Google Ads, and YouTube.• Understands the unique nature of marketing for Estate Planning and Probate services and demonstrates sensitivity in all communications.• Is a strategic thinker who can analyze campaign performance and adapt strategies as needed.• Values long-term collaboration and is looking for a flexible, remote role within a supportive team environment.• Is open to participating in optional weekly team meetings to stay connected with our firm's goals and projects.Compensation:• Hourly Rate: $30 - $40/hour• Weekly Hours: 10 hours, with the flexibility to schedule these hours as you prefer.How to Apply:Please submit your application, including a resume, a cover letter that reflects your understanding of the sensitive nature of our practice areas, and examples of past marketing campaigns you've led or contributed to, especially those in sensitive industries.Applications should be sent via email with "Digital Marketing Specialist Application" as the subject line to [REDACTED_EMAIL] Range: $30.00-$40.00Posted On: February 19, 2024 17:34 UTCCategory: Social Media MarketingSkills:Google Ads, YouTube, Facebook Advertising, Campaign Management, Campaign Setup, Facebook Pixel Setup & Optimization, Facebook, Marketing Strategy, Social Media MarketingSkills: Google Ads, YouTube, Facebook Advertising, Campaign Management, Campaign Setup, Facebook Pixel Setup & Optimization, Facebook, Marketing Strategy, Social Media MarketingCountry: United States"
